___virtual_network_name.description: The name of the virtual network to join

___group_id.description: A unique string that identifies the Connect cluster group this worker belongs to.

___role.description: Deploy connect worker only on nodes with this role.

___name.description: Service name for the connect worker application(s)

___user.description: The user that the service will run as.
___user.title: User

___mem.description: Memory (MB) to allocate to each connect worker instance.

___heap.description: JVM heap allocation (in MB) for connect worker task; should be ~256MB less than total memory for the instance.

___cpus.description: CPU shares to allocate to each connect worker instance.

___virtual_network_plugin_labels.description: Labels to pass to the virtual network plugin (e.g., [{"key": "key_1", "value": "value_1"}, {"key": "key_2", "value": "value_2"}])

___url.description: The base URL for the schema registry.
___url.title: Schema registry url

___kerberos_jaas_secret.description: Kerberos jaas secret containing jaas config
___kerberos_jaas_secret.title: Kerberos jaas secret

___kerberos_krb5_secret.description: Kerberos krb5 secret containing krb5 config
___kerberos_krb5_secret.title: Kerberos krb5 secret

___client_security_protocol.description: Protocol used to communicate with brokers. Valid values are: PLAINTEXT, SSL, SASL_PLAINTEXT, SASL_SSL
___client_security_protocol.title: Kafka client security protocol

___client_sasl_mechanism.description: SASL mechanism used for client connections. This may be any mechanism for which a security provider is available. GSSAPI is the default mechanism.
___client_sasl_mechanism.title: Kafka client sasl mechanism

___client_sasl_kerberos_service_name.description: The Kerberos principal name that Kafka runs as. This can be defined either in Kafka's JAAS config or in Kafka's config.
___client_sasl_kerberos_service_name.title: Kafka client sasl kerberos service name

___zookeeper_connect.description: ... . Note slahes in a kafka service name have to be removed, all excpet the first get replaced by two underscores.
___zookeeper_connect.title: Zookeeper connect

___bootstrap_servers.description: The name of the kafka bootstrapserver. Broker vip (for TLS it is broker-tls.confluent-kafka.l4lb.thisdcos.directory:9093) or comma separated list of broker dns names (like in the kerberos case). Note slahes in a kafka service name have to be removed.
___bootstrap_servers.title: Kafka bootstrap servers
